data.name: The other side: My own horror Demo
data.detailed_description: A small horror about a young man Stefan, whose life turns into a nightmare. Help him cope with the situation and understand what happened. The first 3 chapters are available in the demo.
data.about_the_game: A small horror about a young man Stefan, whose life turns into a nightmare. Help him cope with the situation and understand what happened. The first 3 chapters are available in the demo.
